Name: anal canal cancer
Definition: A large intestine cancer that is located_in the terminal part of the large intestine.

Name: large intestine adenocarcinoma
Definition: A large intestine cancer that has_material_basis_in epithelial cells of glandular origin.

Name: anus cancer
Definition: A large intestine cancer that is located_in the anus.

Name: cecum cancer
Definition: A large intestine cancer that is located_in the cecum.

Name: colorectal cancer
Definition: A large intestine cancer that is located_in the colon and/or located_in the rectum.
